words.defineEn: involving or related to the ideas of a scientific subject rather than its practical use

words.defineEn: someone who theorizes (especially in science or art)
words.defineVi: một người đưa ra lý thuyết (đặc biệt là trong khoa học hoặc nghệ thuật)

examples: Thales theorized that everything in the world is made of water.

words.defineEn: to believe especially on uncertain or tentative grounds

examples: She's so determined that I just know nothing will get in her way, and she'll finish her thesis.

words.defineEn: a statement that is used as a premise in argumentation

examples: That's ironic.

words.defineEn: containing or expressing irony, meaning the opposite of what is said
